data.title: Langenthal · Population
data.meta_description: Population: Langenthal, Switzerland (Bern), 2024 Population, Langenthal on city and population density map
data.text:
Question: What is the population of Langenthal? Answer: Langenthal, Switzerland (Administrative unit: Bern) - last known population is ≈ 15 300 (year 2014). This was 0.187% of total Switzerland population. If population growth rate would be same as in period 2010-2014 (+0.63%/year), Langenthal population in 2024 would be: 16 303*.
